update.description:
The beginnings of a differential drive implementation, a lot of the architecture based on a plugin from @azeey's `levels` branch.

A quick comparison of this branch with Gazebo 9 shows we still need to port surface properties:

 |
-- | --
This branch (when Louise sends wrong commands) | ![drifting.gif](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/3397408235-drifting.gif) 
This branch (ign-physics with DART) | ![diffdrive_correct.gif](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/4107947625-diffdrive_correct.gif)
Gazebo 9 with ODE | ![diffdrivegz9_ode.gif](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/1830473749-diffdrivegz9_ode.gif)
Gazebo 9 with DART | ![diffdrivegz9dart.gif](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/1185248290-diffdrivegz9dart.gif)

### MVP TODOs:

Done!

### Future TODOs:

* Parse `<surface>`'s `<friction>` and `<contact>` in SDF (postponing for this PR, since the demo car works reasonably well, we may need to revisit when integrating X1)
* Handle friction and contact params on `ign-physics`
* Add a teleop program to send commands with the keyboard (could be a GUI plugin or a standalone program)
* Add a joystick program to send commands
update.title: Diff drive

content.raw: Can you add a brief to this? I don't know why this class exists. For example, why don't we use an entity with components that indicate a model.
content.html: Can you add a brief to this? I don't know why this class exists. For example, why don't we use an entity with components that indicate a model.

content.raw: This PR is now ready for review!
content.html: This PR is now ready for review!

update.description:
The beginnings of a differential drive implementation, a lot of the architecture based on a plugin from @azeey's `levels` branch.

A quick comparison of this branch with Gazebo 9 shows we still need to port surface properties:

 |
-- | --
This branch (when Louise sends wrong commands) | ![drifting.gif](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/3397408235-drifting.gif) 
This branch (ign-physics with DART) | ![diffdrive_correct.gif](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/4107947625-diffdrive_correct.gif)
Gazebo 9 with ODE | ![diffdrivegz9_ode.gif](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/1830473749-diffdrivegz9_ode.gif)
Gazebo 9 with DART | ![diffdrivegz9dart.gif](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/1185248290-diffdrivegz9dart.gif)

### MVP TODOs:

* Have 2 vehicles side-by-side in the demo world, which can be controlled independently
* Add tests

### Future TODOs:

* Parse `<surface>`'s `<friction>` and `<contact>` in SDF (postponing for this PR, since the demo car works reasonably well, we may need to revisit when integrating X1)
* Handle friction and contact params on `ign-physics`
* Add a teleop program to send commands with the keyboard (could be a GUI plugin or a standalone program)
* Add a joystick program to send commands
update.title: [WIP] Diff drive

update.description:
The beginnings of a differential drive implementation, a lot of the architecture based on a plugin from @azeey's `levels` branch.

A quick comparison of this branch with Gazebo 9 shows we still need to port surface properties:

 |
-- | --
This branch (when Louise sends wrong commands) | ![drifting.gif](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/3397408235-drifting.gif) 
This branch (ign-physics with DART) | ![diffdrive_correct.gif](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/4107947625-diffdrive_correct.gif)
Gazebo 9 with ODE | ![diffdrivegz9_ode.gif](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/1830473749-diffdrivegz9_ode.gif)
Gazebo 9 with DART | ![diffdrivegz9dart.gif](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/1185248290-diffdrivegz9dart.gif)

### MVP TODOs:

* Have 2 vehicles side-by-side in the demo world, which can be controlled independently
* Add tests

### Future TODOs:

* Parse `<surface>`'s `<friction>` and `<contact>` in SDF (postponing for this PR, since the demo car works reasonably well, we may need to revisit when integrating X1)
* Handle friction and contact params on `ign-physics`
* Add a teleop program to send commands with the keyboard (could be a GUI plugin or a standalone program)
* Add a joystick program to send commands
update.title: [WIP] Diff drive

content.raw: I just made the msgs3 prerelease, and CI is happier
content.html: I just made the msgs3 prerelease, and CI is happier

content.raw: we'll need a prerelease of ign-msgs3 before CI will be happy with this branch
content.html: we'll need a prerelease of ign-msgs3 before CI will be happy with this branch

content.raw:
Yeah +1 to that. This was actually part of why I was publishing the wrong messages, blindly believing `orientation` was euler angles :sweat:

I was actually checking the `ign-ros` bridge to see how the messages were being translated, and it looks like it doesn't handle pose / twist yet, so  I agree it's a good time to add it, I'll do that.
content.html:
Yeah +1 to that. This was actually part of why I was publishing the wrong messages, blindly believing orientation was euler angles

I was actually checking the ign-ros bridge to see how the messages were being translated, and it looks like it doesn't handle pose / twist yet, so I agree it's a good time to add it, I'll do that.

content.raw: Do we want to keep using pose msgs for this? I realize we don't have a Twist message type in ign-msgs, but this might be a good opportunity to add one.
content.html: Do we want to keep using pose msgs for this? I realize we don't have a Twist message type in ign-msgs, but this might be a good opportunity to add one.

update.description:
The beginnings of a differential drive implementation, a lot of the architecture based on a plugin from @azeey's `levels` branch.

A quick comparison of this branch with Gazebo 9 shows we still need to port surface properties:

 |
-- | --
This branch (when Louise sends wrong commands) | ![drifting.gif](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/3397408235-drifting.gif) 
This branch (ign-physics with DART) | ![diffdrive_correct.gif](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/4107947625-diffdrive_correct.gif)
Gazebo 9 with ODE | ![diffdrivegz9_ode.gif](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/1830473749-diffdrivegz9_ode.gif)
Gazebo 9 with DART | ![diffdrivegz9dart.gif](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/1185248290-diffdrivegz9dart.gif)

### MVP TODOs:

* Add tests

### Future TODOs:

* Parse `<surface>`'s `<friction>` and `<contact>` in SDF (postponing for this PR, since the demo car works reasonably well, we may need to revisit when integrating X1)
* Handle friction and contact params on `ign-physics`
* Add a teleop program to send commands with the keyboard (could be a GUI plugin or a standalone program)
* Add a joystick program to send commands
* Move `<plugin>` to `<model>`, and give it the ID of the parent model
update.title: [WIP] Diff drive
